INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT

	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportCommitmentToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

activities.name: GetCommitSourceColumnListToVariable
activities.description: Get Commit Source Column List to Variable

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'
SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)
Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
	UNION
	SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('CK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('CK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2) as ConfigList
	   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
	   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
	  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
	  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
		AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
		AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
	  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
					   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     			  where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value))	
					  )
	UNION 
	SELECT ConfigList
	   from (   
		   SELECT '(DATEDIFF(hour,DateOfBirth,GETDATE())/8766) [Age]'  ConfigList
		   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
		  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
		  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Commitments'
			AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
			AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}'
			AND CHARINDEX('DateOfBirth', lower(ltrim(rtrim(value)))) > 0 
		) SourceConfigInDM
	  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
					  from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 				  				 				  
				  )
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportCommitmentToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @SQLCode Nvarchar(255)
declare @K1 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @K1=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K1 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K1=@K1 OUTPUT

SELECT @K1 as K1

DECLARE @SQLCode Nvarchar(255)
declare @K2 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @K2=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K2 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K2=@K2 OUTPUT

SELECT @K2 as K2

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'
SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)
Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Finance'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('FK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('FK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2) as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Finance'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     	      where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))

	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportFinanceToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'
SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)
Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Reservation'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('RK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('RK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2) as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Reservation'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     	      where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))

	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportReservationToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @SQLCode Nvarchar(255)
declare @K1 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @K1=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K1 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K1=@K1 OUTPUT

SELECT @K1 as K1

DECLARE @SQLCode Nvarchar(255)
declare @K2 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @K2=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K2 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K2=@K2 OUTPUT

SELECT @K2 as K2
SELECT CAST(MAX(RunId) AS VARCHAR(256)) as RunId FROM Mgmt.Log_RunId

sqlReaderQuery.value:
/*  Log The Status as Finish in Execution Results */
UPDATE MGMT
     SET FullJobStatus='Finish'
	from Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results Mgmt
   WHERE LogId=(SELECT MAX(LogId)
                  FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
				 WHERE RunId=@{activity('GetRunId').output.firstRow.RunId})
/* Log the End Time on Run Id */
  UPDATE MGMT
      SET EndDateTime=getdate()
	 FROM Mgmt.Log_RunId Mgmt
	WHERE RunId=@{activity('GetRunId').output.firstRow.RunId}

SELECT 'na'

activities.name: ExecuteImportComtToDM
activities.description: Execute Import Commitment data to DM

activities.name: ExecuteImportFinToDM
activities.description: Execute Import Finance data to DM

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceQuery as string,
	ColumnList as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($SourceQuery),
	format: 'query') ~> CommitSource
CommitSource sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,
		UserName as string,
		UserEmail as string,
		UserCreatedTimeStamp as string,
		LastSignedInTimeStamp as string,
		EmployerAccountId as string,
		Ukprn as string,
		RunId as long,
		AsDm_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		AsDm_UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CommitSink

parameters{
	SourceQuery as string,
	ColumnList as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($SourceQuery),
	format: 'query') ~> Financesource
Financesource sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,
		UserName as string,
		UserEmail as string,
		UserCreatedTimeStamp as string,
		LastSignedInTimeStamp as string,
		EmployerAccountId as string,
		Ukprn as string,
		RunId as long,
		AsDm_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		AsDm_UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinanceSink

parameters{
	SourceQuery as string,
	ColumnList as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($SourceQuery),
	format: 'query') ~> ReservationSource
ReservationSource sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,
		UserName as string,
		UserEmail as string,
		UserCreatedTimeStamp as string,
		LastSignedInTimeStamp as string,
		EmployerAccountId as string,
		Ukprn as string,
		RunId as long,
		AsDm_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		AsDm_UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReservationSink
